title: Clipper
content:
Clipper: A Low-Latency Online Prediction Serving System #  Paper link.
This paper presents a general ML inference framework (developed side by side with TF Serving).

title: INFaaS
content:
INFaaS: A Model-less and Managed Inference Serving System #  Paper link.
This paper proposes a way to construct and search for model-variants such that they meet certain SLO.
